properties.name: m1
properties.description:
UnangaxÌ‚ people enslaved and colonized by Russian fur hunting companies.

"The combination of warfare, disease and starvation wiped out entire villages, reducing the Unangan people to less than 20 percent of the precontact level." (Landgon, 2002:26)

properties.name: m2
properties.description:
Spanish and French explorers briefly contact the Tlingit and Haida people of southeastern Alaska as they map out the coastline.

De Laguna (1972:277) states the early Spanish expeditions introduced smallpox in 1775.

Khlebnikov (1976:29) estimates smallpox arrived in 1770.

properties.name: m3
properties.description: Russians close all ports in Kamchatka to control a smallpox epidemic. (Black 1980:96)
